TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit X509CertificateInitiatorServiceCredential extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示服务所使用的设置，用于验证客户端所出示的证书。

span.span: Represents the settings used by the service to validate the certificate presented by the clients.

summary.span: 它还包含在使用 消息安全身份验证模式时，用于为客户端加密响应或回调的服务证书。

span.span: It also contains a certificate for the service to use for encrypting responses or callbacks for clients when message security authentication mode is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在此类中设置的证书用于加密到客户端的消息，这些消息仅针对使用 `MutualCertificateDuplex` 消息安全身份验证模式配置的绑定。The certificate set in this class is used to encrypt messages to the client only for bindings that are configured with `MutualCertificateDuplex` message security authentication mode.

summary.span: 获取用于验证在身份验证期间客户端所出示的证书的设置。

span.span: Gets the settings used to validate the certificate presented by the client during authentication.

value.span: 在身份验证期间用于验证客户端所出示的证书的设置。

span.span: The settings used to validate the certificate presented by the client during authentication.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性设置证书身份验证属性。The following code shows how to use this property to set the certificate authentication properties.

summary.span: 获取或设置要在 消息安全身份验证模式中使用的证书。

span.span: Gets or sets the certificate to use in message security authentication mode.

value.span: 如果使用 消息安全身份验证模式，则用于加密消息的 将由不相关的双向传输事例中的服务发送给客户端。

span.span: The to use to encrypt messages sent to the client by the service in the uncorrelated duplex transport case if the message security authentication mode is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当使用 `MutualCertificateDuplex` 消息安全身份验证模式时，此属性用于配置为消息安全模式的绑定。This property is used for bindings that are configured to message security mode when `MutualCertificateDuplex` message security authentication mode is used. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此属性获取证书。The following code shows how to use this property to get the certificate.

span.span: An attempt was made to set a read-only credential.

summary.span: 设置证书，该证书用于加密由服务发送给客户端的消息。

span.span: Sets the certificate to use to encrypt messages sent to the client by the service.

summary.span: 此设置只能由使用 消息安全身份验证模式配置的绑定使用。

span.span: This setting is used only by bindings that are configured with the message security authentication mode.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetCertificate (string subjectName, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName);

.method public hidebysig instance void SetCertificate(string subjectName, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation storeLocation, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName storeName) cil managed

span.span: The subject distinguished name.

param.name: storeLocation
param.span: 服务用于获取证书的证书存储区位置。

span.span: The location of the certificate store that the service uses to obtain the certificate.

param.name: storeName
param.span: 要打开的 X.509 证书存储区的名称。

span.span: The name of the X.509 certificate store to open.

summary.span: 使您可以通过指定主题可分辨名称指定用于加密客户端消息的证书。

span.span: Enables you to specify the certificate to use for encrypting messages for the client by specifying the subject distinguished name.

summary.span: 此设置只能由使用 消息安全身份验证模式配置的绑定使用。

span.span: This setting is used only by bindings that are configured with the message security authentication mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关 `subjectName` 参数的更多信息，请参见。For more information about the `subjectName` parameter, see . `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果客户端应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果客户端应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此方法设置证书。The following code shows how to use this method to set the certificate.

summary.span: 指定要用于加密客户端消息的证书。

span.span: Specifies the certificate to use for encrypting messages for the client.

summary.span: 此设置只能由使用 消息安全身份验证模式配置的绑定使用。

span.span: This setting is used only by bindings that are configured with the message security authentication mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `storeLocation` 的值包含在 枚举中：Values for `storeLocation` are included in the enumeration: - ：分配给本地计算机的证书存储区（默认）。: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default). - ：当前用户所使用的证书存储区。: the certificate store used by the current user. 如果应用程序在系统帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in . 如果应用程序在用户帐户下运行，则证书通常位于 。If the application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in . `storeName` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `storeName` are included in the enumeration. `findType` 的值包含在 枚举中。Values for `findType` are included in the enumeration. 最常用的枚举是 ，它在指定存储区中对证书的主题名称执行不区分大小写的搜索。The most commonly used enumeration is , which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store. 这可能是不精确的搜索。This can be an imprecise search. 如果未找到证书或找到了多个与条件相匹配的证书，则将引发 。If no certificates or multiple certificates that match the criteria are found, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用此方法设置证书。The following code shows how to use this method to set the certificate.
